Description:
Detects the execution of Radmin which can be abused by an adversary to remotely control Windows machines

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - Radmin Viewer Utility Execution
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" description="Radmin Viewer" product="Radmin Viewer" original_file_name="Radmin.exe"
